args.name: arc
args.desc: The ARC the whitelist corresponds to

args.name: boxIndex
args.desc: The index of the whitelist box to add the app to

args.name: appID
args.desc: The app ID to add to the whitelist

args.name: payment
args.desc: The payment transaction to cover the MBR change

methods.name: setAppWhitelist

args.name: boxIndex
args.desc: The index of the whitelist box to put the app IDs in

args.name: appIDs
args.desc: Array of app IDs that signify the whitelisted apps

methods.desc: Sets a app whitelist for the sender. Should only be used when adding/removingmore than one app

methods.name: deleteWhitelist

args.name: arc
args.desc: The ARC the whitelist corresponds to

args.name: boxIndex
args.desc: The index of the whitelist box to delete

methods.desc: Deletes a app whitelist for the sender

methods.name: deleteAppFromWhitelist

args.name: boxIndex
args.desc: The index of the whitelist box to delete from

args.name: appID
args.desc: The app ID to delete from the whitelist

args.name: index
args.desc: The index of the app in the whitelist

methods.desc: Deletes a app from a whitelist for the sender
